role_definition: Maintain sub custodian agreement terms and track and report on sub custodian activity. Note the lead custodian role may engage a sub custodian for handling international securities outside its jurisdiction
example_of_use: The contractual terms are referenced during the settlement procedure for a securities trade where the sub custodian holds the associated documentation
executive_summary: This Service Domain establishes and maintains the terms governing sub custodian relationship
key_features: Establish appropriate contractual terms with agency
Maintain and update contractual terms as necessary
Review proposed work/assignments for compliance with agreed terms
